page.title: 07Services in Norham
page.content: Fords- the local bakery makes bread,cakes rolls and pies. There are 2 shops each selling groceries and small household items etc. Johnsons is licensed to sell wine and spirits, whilst Shephards doubles up as a Post-office, newsagent and stationers. The village butcher- Foremans sells various meats jointed on the premises, home-made cooked meats and pies also fresh eggs, game and poultry. Van deliveries are made in Norham and the surrounding areas. The Victoria Hotel and the Masons Arms are licensed by Mrs. Smith and Mrs. Stewart respectively. A pint of beer can be bought for 70p and bar lunch of sandwiches less than Â£1.The Antique shop gives the many summer tourists somewhere to browse whilst their children play on the swings and slide situated on Norham village green.
